tool_description: Get some colors either randomly selected or based on your input base color
name: ColorMe
title: ColorMe

api_list.name: SpecificColorSet
api_list.description: Get a set of colors based on input color like - "yellow" / "red"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://colorme.p.rapidapi.com/api/BasicColorsGenerator/yellow"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colorme.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://colorme.p.rapidapi.com/api/BasicColorsGenerator/{colorname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colorme.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
